attributes.action: Ensure child killers serve more than half of their sentance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
an man was sentenced to 6 yrs 8 months for manslaughter of 8 month old baby girl.
after serving 1 yr 7 months i have received a letter from victim notification sceme informing me that within the next few months he is eligible for open prison, to help him prepare for release.this will consist of giving him a status as low suppervision,and unescorted temporary release back into society to walk freely. this is wrong and needs to be reviewed, when a judge issues a sentence it should stand, and the full sentence should be served. Or even still over half.

rejection.details: Unfortunately we cannot accept petitions which contain details about individual cases. Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
